alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Fountain; Montgomery; Tippecanoe (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 7:50PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Fountain, southern Tippecanoe, northwestern Clinton and northwestern Montgomery Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 749 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from 6 miles east of Lafayette to 10 miles northeast of Veedersburg. Movement was south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. These storms will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Fountain, southern Tippecanoe, northwestern Clinton and northwestern Montgomery Counties, including the following locations... Mulberry, New Richmond, Linden, Waynetown, Clarks Hill, Dayton, Wingate and Shadeland. This includes the following highways... Interstate 65 between mile markers 158 and 171. Interstate 74 between mile markers 24 and 32. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
